Question & Options:
In the movie 'Batman Begins' (2005), which of the following statements about Bruce Wayne's relationship with bats is true?
Options:
A. A) Bruce Wayne's fear of bats originated from an incident in his childhood.
B. B) Bruce Wayne embraced his fear of bats as a child.
C. C) The opera performance triggered Bruce Wayne's fear of bats.
D. D) Bruce Wayne's fear of bats was a result of a traumatic experience.
Correct Answer: A) Bruce Wayne's fear of bats originated from an incident in his childhood., C) The opera performance triggered Bruce Wayne's fear of bats., D) Bruce Wayne's fear of bats was a result of a traumatic experience.

Question & Options:
In the movie 'Batman Begins' (2005), which of the following statements are true regarding Bruce Wayne's relationship with his parents?
Options:
A. A. Bruce Wayne's parents were murdered by Joe Chill.
B. B. Bruce Wayne's parents died in a car accident.
C. C. Bruce Wayne witnessed the murder of his parents.
D. D. Bruce Wayne's parents were killed while attending an opera.

In the movie 'Batman Begins' (2005), how do Alfred Pennyworth and Bruce Wayne's relationship develop after the murder of Bruce Wayne's parents?
Options:
A. Alfred becomes Bruce's devoted butler.
B. Alfred raises Bruce as a surrogate son.
C. Bruce inherits Alfred's wealth.
D. Alfred trains Bruce to become Batman.
Correct Answer: Alfred becomes Bruce's devoted butler, Alfred raises Bruce as a surrogate son.
